subtitleNullable: A Dataset of a Collection of Original Comics from Webtoons
descriptionNullable: ### **Context** The dataset contains +700 unique webtoons with 19 columns containing general information. The information contained in this dataset includes genres, authors, views, likes and etc. The information was scraped from the [Webtoons](https://www.webtoons.com/en/). ### **Content** This dataset contains only the premium content on Webtoons website. Each row of the dataset is a distinct webtoon, such as "Get Schooled" and "Your Throne". The columns contain information about the webtoons, scraped from their info page. - webtoon_id: Comic ID on Webtoons - title: Name of the comic - genre: Genre of the comic - thumbnail: Link to comic thumbnail - summary: Brief summary of the comic - episodes: Number of episodes - created_by: Who created the comic - views: Number of views - subscribers: Number of subscribers - grade: Average Rating on Webtoons - released_date: First episode release date - url: Comic URL - cover: Link to comic URL - likes: Number of likes - written_by: Who wrote the comic - art_by: Who made the art - adapted_by: Who adapted the comic - original_work_by: Original work - assisted_by: Who assisted the comic ### **Acknowledgement** All data were collected from [Webtoons](https://www.webtoons.com/en/).
title: Webtoons Dataset
subtitle: A Dataset of a Collection of Original Comics from Webtoons
